attributes.action: Guarantee that any MP who has made a fraudulent expenses claim faces a criminal prosecution and that any benefit gained from a fraudulent claim is recovered under the proceeds of crime act 2002.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP’s who have made dubious expenses claims such as for mortgage payments when no mortgage exists or for the same plumbing invoice twice must be investigated for fraud. A member of the public who continues to claim state benefits when their situation has changed and they are no longer entitled to those benefits will face a criminal prosecution. If trust is to be restored then MP’s must be treated in the same manner as the electorate and face the same consequences.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
